org.springframework.scheduling.config

类 CronTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.scheduling.config.Task
      • org.springframework.scheduling.config.TriggerTask
        • org.springframework.scheduling.config.CronTask

  • public class CronTask
extends TriggerTask
    TriggerTask implementation defining a Runnable to be executed according to a standard cron expression.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.2
    作者:
    Chris Beams
    另请参阅:
    Scheduled.cron(), ScheduledTaskRegistrar.addCronTask(CronTask)

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      Create a new CronTask.
      CronTask(java.lang.Runnable runnable, java.lang.String expression)
      Create a new CronTask.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getExpression()
      Return the cron expression defining when the task should be executed.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CronTask

        public CronTask(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                java.lang.String expression)
        Create a new CronTask.
        参数:
        runnable - the underlying task to execute
        expression - the cron expression defining when the task should be executed

      • CronTask

        public CronTask(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                CronTrigger cronTrigger)
        Create a new CronTask.
        参数:
        runnable - the underlying task to execute
        cronTrigger - the cron trigger defining when the task should be executed

    • 方法详细资料

      • getExpression

        public java.lang.String getExpression()
        Return the cron expression defining when the task should be executed.
